            SupplyChain365 Mobile Workflow Modified on Mon, 22 Dec at 3:09 PM SupplyChain365 Mobile Workflow What is a Mobile workflow? Workflow automation refers to the use of software to complete some tasks and activities, without the need for human input. It's a tool in the supplychain365 extension for making work faster, easier, and more consistent. By automating workflows, supplychain365 reduces the need for manual work and repetitive tasks. SupplyChain365 mobile workflow: it is possible to automate and force tasks by mobile workflow, for example, take a photo automatically in the mobile app when you a specific process or show a message when you enter the warehouse main menu page, and so on. Supplychain365 Workflow Types: supplychain365 used different types of workflows for example: Ordinary workflow: we use this workflow to automate some tasks in Business Central. click here for more information. click here for tutorial Mobile workflow: as the name represents by mobile workflow, we can automate some tasks that are part of the business central and mobile applications. How to activate mobile workflow in the supplychain365 extension Go to Business Central click on the search button, type mobile workflow, and click the related button. follow these steps: On the mobile workflow page click on new to add a new workflow Code: type the short name of the workflow. Description: Describe what this workflow is going to do. Warehouse group: select a warehouse group or location for the workflow. Enable: this option should be enabled when mobile workflow steps are completed. Mobile workflow steps:several fields must be filled with the correct condition and responses for correctly using mobile workflows. Order: set the order of workflows if there exist several workflows. When event: in this field you can add the event which is the base of the workflow. For example, open the warehouse's main menu. On condition: default value is always but you can define for other values like user, etc. Then response: here is the response for example a message or opening another page or screen. So I write a message then let's see what happens to the mobile app when I open the process. below a video to help users understand the steps visually: document.querySelectorAll('.portal-attachment-thumbnail-img').forEach(function(img) { img.addEventListener('error', function () { attachment_error_image(this); }); }); const attachment_error_image = (attachment) => { const parentElement = attachment.parentElement; const defaultIcon = `${escapeHtml(attachment.dataset.extension)}`; parentElement.innerHTML = defaultIcon; };

            Add or Remove Items or Child License Plate from Licence plate Modified on Mon, 4 Mar, 2024 at 10:38 AM Adding Items or Child License plates How to Add items to the license plate and child license plate into the license plate: Click on the license plate process in the main menu and select LP items, First, you must search for or scan a license plate number after scanning it you can see information about the license plate then you can click on add items in here. In the take, page select a bin location or scan the bin location then scan the item or select it by clicking on it, select how many of the items you want to put in the license plate, and click OK, continue this process till you select all item for the license plate then click done button. On the place page select the bin or scan it to put the item in it. Now the operation is successful and here in bin content, we can see the items that we have in the license plate. So, the process of adding a license plate to a license plate is the same as following the tutorial. Removing Items or Child License plates How to remove items from the license plate and child license plate from the parent license plate: Click on the license plate process in the main menu and select LP items, First, you must search for or scan a license plate number after scanning it you can see information about the license plate then you can click on LP content. Note: if the license plate is new or empty then you see a popup message with no content and close the popup. But if there were items or other license plates inside, then you will see them and remove them from the current license plate. Enter a license plate number that you know has items or a license plate inside. Click on LP or license plate content, now click on an item in the remove quantity page enter how many of the items you like to remove, and press enter. If the item has a serial number or lot number, select it and click Done. In the place page, select bin name and the item removed. The steps to remove a child's license plate from a parent's license plate are the same as removing the item, follow the tutorial to see how to remove a child license plate.             Sorry! nothing found for

            Assembly order (mobile app) Modified on Tue, 13 Aug, 2024 at 9:31 AM Assembly order (mobile app) Once you have created an assembly order in supplychain365 in Business Central and then a pick from it, now you can operate the following actions in the mobile application: Register assembly pick order in the APP Post assembly order in the app Note: the process of assembly order differs according to warehouse settings, but if the warehouse setting uses the directed put-away and pick option then you must first pick the order. For non-directed it is enough to ensure that the consumption items are in the correct bin, for example, an inventory movement. To register an assembly pick order, you need to follow these steps: First you must create a pick order from assembly order then jump to mobile application and follow the next steps. this is how you create pick order. Open the mobile application open the warehouse main menu and click on the picking process Click the assembly order that you want to pick, for example, I select this pick order and I know that this pick order is an assembly order. Open them if they are more than one order click on them and follow on-screen instructions to complete the picking order process. For more information about picking click here. Post assembly order After completing the picking order process go back to the warehouse main menu and select the assembly process. Here are all assembly orders that are ready to be posted, click on the order that you want to post and click on the done button. Select as much as you want to assemble complete the tracking process and select lot number or serial number if they have then click on the complete button to close the process and post the assembly order. Below a video to understand the steps visually: document.querySelectorAll('.portal-attachment-thumbnail-img').forEach(function(img) { img.addEventListener('error', function () { attachment_error_image(this); }); }); const attachment_error_image = (attachment) => { const parentElement = attachment.parentElement; const defaultIcon = `${escapeHtml(attachment.dataset.extension)}`; parentElement.innerHTML = defaultIcon; };
